policy_651483963895698.jcr:description: - Enable lazy loading for faster page loading. - Define allowed image widths for automatic loading of the image in the most optimal resolution, given the size at which each image is displayed on the page, and the visitor's pixel density. - Disallow direct asset upload, to force authors to first upload the images to Assets.
policy_651483963895698.jcr:title: Content Image

policy_651483963895698.jcr:description: - Enable lazy loading for faster page loading. - Define allowed image widths for automatic loading of the image in the most optimal resolution, given the size at which each image is displayed on the page, and the visitor's pixel density. - Disallow direct asset upload, to force authors to first upload the images to Assets.

policy_641475696923109.jcr:description: Allows only H1 and disallows links for the main page title.
policy_641475696923109.jcr:title: Page Title

policy_641528232375303.jcr:description: Allows all sizes, but not H1, which is reserved for the main page title.
policy_641528232375303.jcr:title: Content Title

policy_1575031387650.jcr:description: Sets the title size to H3.
policy_1575031387650.jcr:title: Content Teaser

policy_1575032193319.jcr:description: Sets the title size to H3.
policy_1575032193319.jcr:title: Content Download

policy_header.jcr:description: Sets a <header> element on the page header experience fragment.
policy_header.jcr:title: Page Header

policy_footer.jcr:description: Sets a <footer> element on the page footer experience fragment.
policy_footer.jcr:title: Page Footer

policy_1574694950110.jcr:description: Allows the template components and defines the component mapping (this configures what components should be automatically created when authors drop assets from the content finder to the page editor).
policy_1574694950110.jcr:title: Page Root

policy_1574695586800.jcr:description: Allows the page components and defines the component mapping (this configures what components should be automatically created when authors drop assets from the content finder to the page editor).
policy_1574695586800.jcr:title: Home Page Containers

policy_649128221558427.jcr:description: Sets a <main> element on the page content area.
policy_649128221558427.jcr:title: Page Main

policy_1575040440977.jcr:description: Allows the template components and defines the component mapping (this configures what components should be automatically created when authors drop assets from the content finder to the page editor).
policy_1575040440977.jcr:title: XF Root
